name: Zono Blast
description:
Having crash-landed on the cubic planet Zono you are besieged by the reptile menace. Destroy them or be destroyed.

1P: Arrow Keys for Movement, Z to Shoot, and X to Strafe.

2P: IJKL for Movement, N to Shoot, and M to Strafe.

XBOX 360 Controller: Left analog stick for movement. A,RB, or RT to Shoot. X, LB, or LT to Strafe.

ORIGINALLY MADE IN 48 HOURS FOR THE WINNITRON GAME JAM. UPGRADED OVER THE COURSE OF THE FOLLOWING WEEK.

Can be found on Gamejolt, and Kongregate.
